Summary: Flash of white light apporximately 5 ft. off ground
trends: There has been one other sighting in Hamilton
There were no other sightings in Hamilton on or around May 20th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was with my friend driving down Mountain or Lickskillet Rd. (I'm not sure of which road)in Harris County at apporximately 5:30 AM EDT, When both of us saw a flash of white light, very close to the ground, that lasted 3-5 seconds. I thought the object was a car's headlights, but the flash occured roughly 20 ft. in front my friend's car, and the nearest intersection was roughly 500 ft. away. The flash in question appeared and disappeared very quickly. My first reaction was, "what the ****!". I was Basically petrified with fear and supirse for the next 20 minutes.
